name: Path Runner
description:
Path Runner

Virus Scan

Controls

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Move backwards

ESC - Close the Game!!!

This game was developed in a 6 Hour rush period using Unity3d and Blender the game cost $2.00 USD however you have a suggested amount of $5.00 USD both would help support furthering this project and the production of more products.

The models and assets used in this project are property of WastedHoursPorject® (With the exception of the SkyBox which is listed bellow).

The goal of this game is the reach the end of the Track with the best time, if you reach the end please send a image to WastedHoursProject@Gmail.com as we would love to see who holds the best time.

Future Updates

We think having goals for the game is very important so currently here is what we have and are open to suggestions.

1. Multiplayer Content - This being that 1-8 player or more could play on the same world file giving the opportunity for groups to assist team mates.

2. Collection System - Being that currently the only goal is the reach the end of the run we would like to add some complexity to this and add in a collection system.

- Items to collect - Hidden threw-out the map/maps will items to collect ranging from Grass Chucks, Stones, Bark, Diamonds, Blood Diamonds. Each item will have a use to it which could give perks to the upcoming maps.

3. Proper LeaderBoard - To do this how we would like the Multiplayer Content would first have to be online along with a host of other things so this will be late game content.
